trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Brawley
There were no other sightings in Brawley on or around February 17th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsdull red,orange light appeared above thedistant mountains, moving from the wnw in a straight line until almost overhead,thenmade a90 degree turn to the wsw and fell below the mountains. My wife saw the object but only after it madethe turn. (Icalled her to see the ISS!) The object was seen by one other person who did not see it until ithad turned.
